msContents.summary: Bifolium containing 2 different exercises in 7 parts each for singing. The syllables -- sa-ri-ga-ma-ga-ri-sa-ri-ga-ri-sa-ri-ga-ma -- are repeated in various combinations of musical measures (tāla) such as maṭa, rūpaka, and tripuṭa; said to be a part of the Saṃgītaśāstra on manuscript wrapping.
